page.title: 17Religion
page.content: Higher Carnkie Chapel ______________________ This was founded in 1832 and cost Â£66 to build.The Sunday school started in 1835 and a new Sunday school was opened in 1968 designed by Mr. Roy Jeffery. Carnkie Wesley Chapel ______________________ The first chapel was recorded in 1786 and the present chapel was opened in 1905.A piped organ was installed in 1935 with a hand blower. Three years later electricity came to the village and an electric blower was put in.The chapel was renovated in 1975 and was re-opened in 1976.This is the 3rd Chapel on this site. Redruth Church _______________ This church is to St. Euny the Cornish Missioner and was rebuilt in 1756 with local granite.
